data.title: Silsilad Gabay by Homotopia Festival
data.meta_description: Play Silsilad Gabay by Homotopia Festival on desktop and mobile. Play over 320 million tracks for free on SoundCloud.
data.text:
published on 2020-07-14T12:11:57Z

Silsilad Gabay, is a responsive audio experience, led by Our Space and commissioned by Homotopia. Bringing together eight QTIPoC artists from all over the world, to curate a digital chain of creative interactions between artists, Silsilad Gabay will take you on a journey filled with poetry, spoken word, original music and singing, streams of consciousness and more. Show your support for QTIPOC artists and purchase the audio file here: https://ourspaceleeds.com/shop.html#!/products/silsilad-gabay-audio-experience To skip to the start of the artistsâ contribution go to 7:33. Participating artists: Our Space lead artist Dahab IG: @OurSpaceLeeds Axelle IG: @Queeraxtivist Monthati Masebe Youtube: Monthati Masebe / IG & Twitter: @Monthati_m / Digital Streaming Platforms: Ruby Poxy (CW: brief mention of gender-based violence) Maroodi IG: @abdimaroodi CW: gender discomfort / dysphoria Marlanda Dekine-sapient Soul Digital Streaming Platforms: Ruby: Sapient Soul /Website: http://sapientsoul.com/ Vijay Patel Twitter: @vpateltheatre / IG: vijayrajpatel92 (CW: Black Lives Matter protests, loud noises, mental health, neurodivergence, COVID-19) Nahi Mitti (Nahi Mitti) IG: @nahi_mitti Yas Lime IG: @Yas_Lime_ / Website: https://yasmynart.wixsite.com/work (CW: Black Lives Matter protests including the names of people killed by police brutality, loud sounds) Nidaaro IG & Twitter: @nidaaro (CW: Anti-Black racism & colourism) Our Space lead artist Sayang IG: @saya.n.g / @OurSpaceLeeds Our Space website and shop: www.ourspaceleeds.com MUSIC CREDITS: Sodewow by Maryan Mursal Healer by JNE william feat. Theophilius London Healer by Sampa The Great Wrestlemania 20 by Westside Gunn feat. Anderson Paak No Evil by Mpho Sebina Sink or Swim by Jacob Banks Home by Ila J Original music and vocals by Monthati Masebe Somali folk music Go Down Moses by Soprano Jazmin Black Grollemnud IG: @sopranomund Music by Marlanda Marlanda Dekine-Sapient Soul Go Down Moses originally by Marian Anderson A sample of Chris Smoove: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnzbVkknmqhRqUKg7RDTDeg A sample of "Asia Travel Company", by Takenobu Mitsuyoshi, Yuzo Koshiro, Takeshi Yanagawa, Osamu Murata and Ryuji Iuchi, from the Shenmue Passport Disc. The Moon and the Prince from the Katamari Damacy Soundtrack. All credit to Namco. Music and lyrics by Akitaka Tohyama. Vocals by Kenji Ninuma and Fumina. Performance by Afro-Peruvian artist and activist Victoria Santa Cruz titled âMi gritarone negro (They called me black)â Traditional Folklore southern somali dance called âGabley Shimbirâ Wedding/war dance called âSiday âiisahaâ
